alert.note: Alert for Gogebic (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 9:19PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gogebic County through 845 PM CDT... At 819 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Mercer, or 11 miles south of Ironwood, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Gogebic County, including the following locations... Presque Isle Reservoir and Chaney Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
